attributes.action: PM wrong with rising number of knife crime and police numbers on streets of UK.
attributes.background: Its sickening to see how many people are being stabbed on our streets, the government have no idea what to do about it now, we need more police on our streets sooner rather than later.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you want the Government to fund more police on the streets, you may wish to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/228088

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
